about_the_game:
Play as Momijimaru, an elite loli ninja cursed with the ears and tail of a fox, where you will make use of her skills in stealth and assassination to accomplish her mission. The Emperor's forces are after your family, and it's up to you to outsmart, outfight, and outlast your enemies. With limited time and resources, you must avoid detection, and—when necessary—strike with deadly precision. Whether you choose to leave no trace, or to cut through anyone in your way, the fate of your mission is defined by your choices. But if you are caught, the consequences could be dire.

Do you have what it takes to see the mission through to the end unscathed?

The Shadows or The Blade: 

Choose your path. Can you face the challenge of sticking to the shadows and eluding your enemies, leaving them none the wiser that you were ever there? Or will you engage your foes head on in combat to cut down those that stand between you and completing your mission? The choice is yours, but beware—getting caught has its consequences.

Limited Resources: 

Each moment counts—Manage your limited number of steps to outmaneuver your enemies, and to find relief in the midst of the storm.

One-Hit Kills: Engage in fast-paced, lethal combat. Every strike from your blade is deadly, but the same goes for your enemies as well.

Multiple Endings: Choosing to finish the game without taking a single life, or leaving a trail of bodies behind you will affect the story and how the game ultimately ends in their own way.

Achievements: Unlock a variety of achievements as you progress, from mastering stealth to combat prowess.

highlighted.name: You Can Sleep When You're Dead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Join Momijimaru, an elite ninja on a mission of survival in this Stealth ARPG! Sneak past enemies and strike from the shadows—or confront them head-on with a decisive blow! But beware, one wrong move can lead our agent of shadows into many precarious situations!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
